questions: Is there an old man in a fabric smock splattering paint in the image?
Is there a young man in wooden goggles and an oversized t-shirt in the image?
Does the image present a differentiation logic: an old man in a smock splattering paint alongside a young man in an oversized t-shirt and goggles?
Is the smock made of fabric?
Are the goggles made of wood?
model_output:
no The old man is wearing a yellow shirt, not a fabric smock.
no The young man is wearing a cap and sunglasses, not wooden goggles.
yes The image shows an old man and a young man engaging in painting activities, presenting a contrast between them.
no The old man is not wearing a smock; he is wearing a yellow shirt.
no The goggles are not made of wood; they appear to be made of plastic or a similar material.
